condition: [OR](<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion Server).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (ACE).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Simulation PC).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Mobile Terminal Server).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Console Station ES-C).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Console).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion TPS Server).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (ACE)1.Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (ACE-T).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion APP).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Simulation PC)1.Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F)1.Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore (TPS Station ES-T).Yes)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Backup & Restore ConsoleStation Extension.Yes)*>)
name: EBR Server Visibility allow
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Hard Disk Server EBR,Display Size server EBR,Display Supplier EBR,EBR Server,Node Supplier Server EBR,Server Location EBR,Server Node Type EBR,Trusted Platform Module TPM EBR)*>
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Additional Hard Disk Server EBR)*>,)){<*SELECTVALUE(Additional Hard Disk Server EBR:No)*>}{if_false}[ENDIF],
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Display Size server EBR)*>,)){<*SELECTVALUE(Display Size server EBR:27 inch NTS NEC)*>}{if_false}[ENDIF],
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Display Supplier EBR)*>,)){<*SELECTVALUE(Display Supplier EBR:Honeywell)*>}{if_false}[ENDIF],
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Node Supplier Server EBR)*>,)){<*SELECTVALUE(Node Supplier Server EBR:Honeywell)*>}{if_false}[ENDIF],
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Server Location EBR)*>,)){<*SELECTVALUE(Server Location EBR:Location/Cluster/Network Group 1)*>}{if_false}[ENDIF],
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Server Node Type EBR)*>,)){<*SELECTVALUE(Server Node Type EBR:SVR_STD_DELL_Tower_RAID1)*>}{if_false}[ENDIF],
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Trusted Platform Module TPM EBR)*>,)){<*SELECTVALUE(Trusted Platform Module TPM EBR:Yes)*>}{if_false}[ENDIF]
<*SETREQUIRED(Additional Hard Disk Server EBR,Display Size server EBR,Display Supplier EBR,Node Supplier Server EBR,Server Location EBR,Server Node Type EBR,Trusted Platform Module TPM EBR)*><*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Server Location EBR:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
